thread.title: THIRD VISIT, CONTINUALLY GOOD
thread.title_full: THIRD VISIT, CONTINUALLY GOOD - Review of Premier Inn London Waterloo (Westminster Bridge) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: bevilj
title: THIRD VISIT, CONTINUALLY GOOD
text: So handy for Waterloo Main Line Station, not only that this Premier Inn remains as good as ever. Fast check in, Front Staff the same as last year, welcoming and helpful. Even the Barman remembered us. Breakfast and evening meals consistently good. Why go any where else.
